# Extendicare

## Daily 24-Hour Symptom Surveillance Form (Mandatory)**THIS FORM MUST BE REVIEWED EVERY DAY INCLUDING WEEKENDS AND PUBLIC HOLIDAYS**- **Home:**

- **Resident Home Area:**
